Decomposes the matrix into a scale, shear, rotate and translate components

Returns the scale factors

shear

Returns shear factors

rotate

Returns rotation as Euler angles

translate

Returns translation components

Decompose
void Decompose(
std::vector<Matrix4x4> &tm,
bool undoshear
)

Decomposes the matrix into a scale, shear, rotate and translate matrices.  If undoshear is true then the shear is decomposed into a Rotate X Scale X Rotate

Returns
tm

returns a list of matrices.  if undoshear == true then

tm[0]

scale matrix

tm[1]

ShearXY rotate matrix

tm[2]

ShearXY scale matrix

tm[3]

ShearXY rotate matrix

tm[4]

ShearXZ rotate matrix

tm[5]

ShearXZ scale matrix

tm[6]

ShearXZ rotate matrix

tm[7]

ShearYZ rotate matrix

tm[8]

ShearYZ scale matrix

tm[9]

ShearYZ rotate matrix

tm[10]

RotateX

tm[11]

RotateY

tm[12]

RotateZ else

tm[0]

scale matrix

tm[1]

ShearXY

tm[2]

ShearXZ

tm[3]

ShearYZ

tm[4]

RotateX

tm[5]

RotateY

tm[6]

RotateZ
